tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE advocacy_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    milestone_1 VARCHAR(255),
    milestone_2 VARCHAR(255),
    deadline_1 DATE,
    deadline_2 DATE,
    action_item_1 TEXT,
    action_item_2 TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_initiatives (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
);

CREATE TABLE milestones (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    milestone_description TEXT,
    completion_date DATE,
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id)
    REFERENCES advocacy_initiatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE action_items (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_description TEXT,
    deadline DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN,
    milestone_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (milestone_id)
    REFERENCES milestones(id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdvocacyInitiatives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Milestones (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    milestone_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    target_date DATE,
    actual_date DATE,
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES AdvocacyInitiatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Deadlines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deadline_name VARCHAR(255),
    due_date DATE,
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES AdvocacyInitiatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ActionItems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    milestone_id INT,
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (milestone_id) REFERENCES Milestones(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES AdvocacyInitiatives(id)
);
